description: Download a compressed fine-tuned model or checkpoint to local disk.

parameters.description: Fine-tune ID to download. A string that starts with `ft-`.
parameters.name: ft_id

parameters.description: Specifies step number for checkpoint to download. Ignores `checkpoint` value if set.
parameters.name: checkpoint_step

parameters.description: Specifies checkpoint type to download - `merged` vs `adapter`. This field is required if the checkpoint_step is not set.
parameters.name: checkpoint

parameters.description: Specifies output file name for downloaded model. Defaults to `$PWD/{model_name}.{extension}`.
parameters.name: output

200.description: Successfully downloaded the fine-tuned model or checkpoint.
